titleStmt.title: The exact politician, or, Compleat statesman briefly and methodically resolved into such principles whereby gentlemen may be qualified for the management of any publick trust, and thereby rendered useful in every station to the establishment of the common welfare / written by Leonard Willan, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Willan, Leonard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dorman Newman and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
